title: Lightweight and Accurate Multi-View Stereo with Confidence-Aware Diffusion Model
summary: This paper proposes a lightweight and accurate multi-view stereo method using a confidence-aware diffusion model to reconstruct 3D geometry from calibrated images. It focuses on improving computational efficiency by initializing a coarse depth map and refining it iteratively.
usefulness_reason: The abstract mentions "fuse depth maps into a mesh or point cloud". While "point cloud" is mentioned, it's in the context of 3D geometry reconstruction, not a statistical "point process". However, the term "point" is present, making it tangentially relevant to "Point Process".
